ACCOUNT.LOGIN_REQUIRED_TEXT: Access to this page is restricted to logged in users.
ACCOUNT.STORAGE_TEXT: Graasp provides a limited free storage for its users. In a near future, user plans will be available to unlock more data storage. If you are interested, let us know by contacting <0>{{email}}</0>.
ACCOUNT.STORAGE_INFO: Storage takes into account all uploaded files such as PDF, images, videos, audio, etc. Folders, apps and Graasp documents are not included.
ACCOUNT.CROP_IMAGE_MODAL_CONTENT_TEXT: Crop your chosen image to fit the image size requirements.
ACCOUNT.CROP_IMAGE_MODAL_UNEXPECTED_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred when trying to crop the image, please try again later
ACCOUNT.SAVE_ACTIONS_TOGGLE_TOOLTIP: We collect analytics data to improve your user experience while browsing Graasp.
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_DELETE_ACCOUNT_MODAL_INFORMATION: Your account will be deleted permanently.
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_DELETE_ACCOUNT_INFORMATION: Once you delete an account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
ACCOUNT.PASSWORD_SETTINGS_INFORMATION: Update your password by clicking on the 'Edit' button
ACCOUNT.PASSWORD_SETTINGS_INFORMATION_NEW_PASSWO: Add a password by clicking on the 'Configure' button
ACCOUNT.PASSWORD_SETTINGS_CONFIRM_INFORMATION: Make sure it is at least 8 characters including a number, a lowercase letter and an uppercase letter.
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION: Personalize your public profile to let other users interested in your work know a bit more about you. You can make it private anytime.
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_LINKEDIN_LINK_ERROR_MSG: LinkedIn Link is not a valid url
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_LINKEDIN_EMPTY_MSG: No LinkedIn username has been specified
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_TWITTER_LINK_ERROR_MSG: Twitter Link is not a valid url
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_TWITTER_EMPTY_MSG: No Twitter username has been specified
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_FACEBOOK_LINK_ERROR_MSG: Facebook Link is not a valid url
ACCOUNT.PUBLIC_PROFILE_FACEBOOK_EMPTY_MSG: No Facebook username has been specified
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_DELETE_TYPE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: To confirm the deletion, type "{{text}}" below:
ACCOUNT.USERNAME_LENGTH_ERROR: Username must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters long
ACCOUNT.SECURITY_TIPS_INFORMATION: You haven't set a password, you can set one to access your account without opening your email.
ACCOUNT.PERSONALIZATION_INFORMATION: Let your personality and uniqueness shine by adding a profile picture!
ACCOUNT.VALIDATE_EMAIL_TEXT: You requested to change your email to the one shown below, please click on the button to validate your new email.
ACCOUNT.EMAIL_UPDATE_UNAUTHORIZED_TITLE: We were unable to validate your email, the link might be outdated
ACCOUNT.EMAIL_UPDATE_UNAUTHORIZED_TEXT_LINK_VALI: The link sent via email is valid for 24 hours only. Please ensure that you are using a fresh link.
ACCOUNT.EMAIL_UPDATE_UNAUTHORIZED_TEXT_LINK_GENE: You can generate a new link by editing your email in your profile.
Edit my email in account settings
ACCOUNT.EMAIL_UPDATE_CONFLICT_TEXT: The email you are trying to validate is not available anymore because it has been registered with a different Graasp account.
ACCOUNT.PROFILE_EMAIL_UPDATED_ALERT_MESSAGE: A validation link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your mailbox.
ACCOUNT.MEMBER_STORAGE_FILES_ERROR: Oops, an error occurred while fetching storage files. Please try again later.
ACCOUNT.EXPORT_INFORMATIONS_TITLE: Download a copy of your data
ACCOUNT.EXPORT_INFORMATIONS_DESCRIPTION: You can download a copy of your data.
ACCOUNT.EXPORT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have successfully requested your data. You will receive an e-mail with your data in a few minutes.
ACCOUNT.NOT_FOUND_PAGE_MESSAGE: Sorry, we could not find this page.
ACCOUNT.NOT_AUTHENTICATED_OR_GUEST_MESSAGE: User is a guest or is not authenticated
ACCOUNT.PASSWORD_WEAK_ERROR: This password is too weak, please follow the password requirements above.
ACCOUNT.PASSWORD_DO_NOT_MATCH_ERROR: This input does not match the new password.
ACCOUNT.NEW_PASSWORD_SHOULD_NOT_MATCH_CURRENT_PA: The new password should not match the current one.
ACCOUNT.TEMPORARY_MOVED_ACCOUNT_HOME_PAGE_MESSAG: The home page of account has moved
